fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player next to your occupied space to occupy their house.
- Select a player next to your occupied space to attack them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and conversion immune.
- You can use both abilities at once. However, attacking is always done after moving - you cannot attack a player, *then* move away.
- Your abilities consider your current occupied space as your spot on the playerlist, not your actual spot.
- You learn the role of the player's house you're occupying.
- You always spawn with the Chess faction.
- If you die, the Chess faction loses.
- Every time you would be attacked, you may use your ability to move away for free. **This is always available to use. Roleblocking, being jailed, controls, redirects, even anything that would bypass immunity does not apply.** Even if you moved normally, you can still move out of check. Even if you moved then attacked, this attribute still applies.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Protect the King from checkmate and deliver mate to the enemy.
